title: Why always LeaverBuster? Any evidence?
body: I never leave a game, today I have played a whole night in order to achieve level 30. But this morning after one game, I was required to wait LeaverBuster again. I stay right in front of the screen, not leave for 1 sec. What is the reason?

replies.body: The [**LeaverBuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) should answer most of your questions regarding this system. Generally, they're not reversed, as certain objective parameters must be met before LeaverBuster is enacted. If you believe that LB was applied in error, you can contact [**Riot Games Player Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they can look into it further. Let me know if you have any questions!
